pages.text: If you're not the reader type, you can get started with $(thing)Bliss$() by checking out the videos done by these amazing folks on the next page.$(br2)$(thing)direwolf20$()'s video is a short starter guide with the info you need to know about the pack, and $(thing)Vallen$()'s video is a full overview and review of the pack. Pick whichever, or both!
